verses.text: Now the men of Israel had sworn in Mizpeh, saying, There shall not any of us give his daughter unto Benjamin to wife.
And the people came \add to\add* the house of God, and abode there till even before God, and lift up their voices, and wept sore;
and said, O \sc Lord\sc* God of Israel, why is this come to pass in Israel, that there should be to day one tribe lacking in Israel?
And it came to pass on the morrow, that the people rose early, and built there an altar, and offered burnt offerings and peace offerings.

And the children of Israel said, Who \add is there\add* among all the tribes of Israel that came not up with the congregation unto the \sc Lord\sc*? For \add they\add* had made a great oath concerning \add him\add* that came not up to the \sc Lord\sc* \add to\add* Mizpeh, saying, He shall surely be put to death.
And the children of Israel repented them for Benjamin their brother, and said, There is one tribe cut off from Israel \add this\add* day.
How shall we do for wives for them that remain, seeing we have sworn by the \sc Lord\sc* that \add we\add* will not give them of our daughters to wives?

And they said, What one \add is there\add* of the tribes of Israel that came not up \add to\add* Mizpeh to the \sc Lord\sc*? And behold, there came none to the camp from Jabesh-gilead to the assembly.
For the people were numbered, and behold, \add there were\add* none of the inhabitants of Jabesh-gilead there.

And the congregation sent thither twelve thousand men of the valiantest, and commanded them, saying, Go and smite the inhabitants of Jabesh-gilead with the edge of the sword, with the women and the children.
And this \add is\add* the thing that ye shall do, Ye shall utterly destroy every male, and every woman that hath lien by man.

And they found among the inhabitants of Jabesh-gilead four hundred young virgins, that had known no man by lying with \add any\add* male: and they brought them unto the camp \add to\add* Shiloh, which \add is\add* in the land of Canaan.
And the whole congregation sent \add some\add* to speak to the children of Benjamin that \add were\add* in the rock Rimmon, and to call peaceably unto them.
And Benjamin came again at that time; and they gave them wives which they had saved alive of the women of Jabesh-gilead: and yet so they sufficed them not.
And the people repented them for Benjamin, because that the \sc Lord\sc* had made a breach in the tribes of Israel.
Then the elders of the congregation said, How shall we do for wives for them that remain, seeing the women are destroyed out of Benjamin?
And they said, \add There must be\add* an inheritance for them that be escaped of Benjamin, that a tribe be not destroyed out of Israel.
Howbeit we may not give them wives of our daughters: for the children of Israel have sworn, saying, Cursed \add be\add* he that giveth a wife to Benjamin.

Then they said, Behold, \add there is\add* a feast of the \sc Lord\sc* in Shiloh yearly \add in a place\add* which \add is\add* on the north side of Beth-el, on the east side of the highway that goeth up from Beth-el to Shechem, and on the south of Lebonah.
Therefore they commanded the children of Benjamin, saying, Go and lie in wait in the vineyards;

and see, and behold, if the daughters of Shiloh come out to dance in dances, then come ye out of the vineyards, and catch you every man his wife of the daughters of Shiloh, and go \add to\add* the land of Benjamin.

And it shall be, when their fathers or their brethren come unto us to complain, that we will say unto them, Be favourable unto them for our sakes: because we reserved not to each man his wife in the war: for ye did not give unto them at \add this\add* time, \add that\add* you should be guilty.

And the children of Benjamin did so, and took \add them\add* wives, according to their number, of them that danced, whom they caught: and they went and returned unto their inheritance, and repaired the cities, and dwelt in them.
And the children of Israel departed thence at that time, every man to his tribe and to his family, and they went out from thence every man to his inheritance.
In those days \add there was\add* no king in Israel: every man did \add that\add* which \add was\add* right in his own eyes.
